metadata.title: CVE-2019-19227 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In the AppleTalk subsystem in the Linux kernel before 5.1, there is apotential NULL pointer dereference because register_snap_client may returnNULL. This will lead to denial of service in net/appletalk/aarp.c andnet/appletalk/ddp.c, as demonstrated by unregister_snap_client, akaCID-9804501fa122.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
